worker_axe_steel_recipe.description: Craft a tool that Workers can use to greatly improve their efficiency when cutting trees.

worker_hammer_iron_recipe.description: Craft a tool that Workers can use to slightly improve their efficiency when building.

worker_hammer_steel_recipe.description: Craft a tool that Workers can use to greatly improve their efficiency when building.

mining_pick_iron_recipe.description: Craft a tool that Workers can use to slightly improve their efficiency when mining.
mining_pick_iron_recipe.flavor: This tool will also improve the odds of obtaining better quality resources

mining_pick_steel_recipe.description: Craft a tool that Workers can use to greatly improve their efficiency when mining.
mining_pick_steel_recipe.flavor: This tool will also improve the odds of obtaining better quality resources

worker_tools_iron_recipe.description: Craft a set of iron tools for workers.
worker_tools_iron_recipe.flavor: Slightly increases the odds of mining better quality resources and somewhat boosts their work speed when chopping, mining and building.

worker_tools_steel_recipe.description: Craft a set of steel tools for workers.
worker_tools_steel_recipe.flavor: Increases the odds of mining better quality resources and substantially boosts their work speed when chopping, mining and building.

gold_ingot_from_coins_recipe.description: Meld 100 gold coins together to form an ingot.

gold_coins_from_ingot_recipe.description: Melt a gold ingot to mint gold coins that can be used in trading!

gold_coins_from_flakes_recipe.description: Melt gold flakes into gold coins that can be used in trading!

blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.description: Required for refining certain materials like wood and coal.
blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.flavor: A strong fire requires the purest fuel. And that starts with hard work. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_crucible_recipe.description: Can be used for melting and working metals or creating alloys.
blacksmith_crucible_recipe.flavor: Fire and stone shall give you metal, but with metal and metal you shall... Well, get even more metal. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_forge_recipe.description: Used to heat and smelt ore into usable metal ingots.

blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.description: Improved and more efficient than regular furnaces, this furnace is hot enough to smelt precious metals.
blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.flavor: All that is gold does not glitter; but if it does, a good furnace will smelt it. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.description: This incredible anvil can keep the metal hot for the most intricate and powerful crafts.
blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.flavor: Balance between heating and hammering is essential. Or just do both at once. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

charcoal_recipe.description: Heat wood in the absence of oxygen to acquire charcoal, a good grade fuel.
charcoal_recipe.flavor: Experts call it 'slow pyrolysis'. I call it BIG BONFIRE!

coke_recipe.description: Heat Lumps o' Coal without burning them to efficiently produce coke, a good grade fuel.
coke_recipe.flavor: Cook with coal or coke coal to cook with coke?

bulk_charcoal_recipe.description: Skill allows the Blacksmith to more efficiently burn wood, producing more charcoal.

bulk_coke_recipe.description: Mastery of the craft allows the Blacksmith to achieve maximum efficiency in coking coal.

bulk_copper_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use copper ore more efficiently.

bulk_tin_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use tin ore more efficiently.

bulk_iron_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use iron ore more efficiently.

copper_wall_lantern_recipe.description: A beautiful lantern. Place on buildings to provide light at night.

copper_garden_lantern_recipe.description: A small lantern that's placed on the ground. Suitable for lighting paths or small gardens.

iron_helmet_recipe.description: Even more protection for one's head.

iron_platemail_recipe.description: A full suit of iron designed for a new and promising knight.

steel_helm_recipe.description: Strong and not so heavy protection for one's head.

steel_chainmail_recipe.description: A very fancy and strong chainmail suit of armor for a Footman.

light_iron_shield_recipe.description: Not so heavy but also not so strong.

light_steel_shield_recipe.description: Perfect balance between protection and weight.
light_steel_shield_recipe.flavor: The finest defense for a Footman!

silver_shield_recipe.description: A very strong Knight's shield made with silver.

bronze_axe_recipe.description: A heavier alternative for a starting metal weapon. Can open wounds.

bronze_sword_recipe.description: Basic, but better than a sharpened stick. Can hamstring opponents.

iron_battle_axe_recipe.description: Extra large for when you need some extra punch. Can open wounds.
iron_battle_axe_recipe.flavor: 'Are these all of them?' shouted Rovnar 'They might as well make a line'

iron_sword_recipe.description: A strong and well balanced weapon. Can hamstring opponents.
iron_sword_recipe.flavor: 'I AM YOUR KING!' screamed Regnar Icevulf brandishing his sword.

steel_mace_recipe.description: A powerful and reliable weapon for a Knight.

iron_axe_recipe.description: A short and cheap but efficient weapon.

steel_axe_recipe.description: Very good for hacking and slashing.
steel_axe_recipe.flavor: '...and one hearthling after the other they all drew their axes above the shieldwall.' - The Valin Saga

bronze_hatchet_recipe.description: For parrying attacks and attempting counter-attacks. Puts enemies out of balance.

iron_hatchet_recipe.description: A sturdy small axe used for parrying and attacking. Puts enemies out of balance.

steel_dagger_recipe.description: A small and sharp weapon for both offense and defense. Puts enemies out of balance.
steel_dagger_recipe.flavor: 'There are few things as useful that you can conceal as easily' -O.A.E Guidelines

steel_lance_recipe.description: A long and strong Knight's polearm for harassing multiple enemies. Shakes their hearts!

silver_halberd_recipe.description: An intricate and powerful Knight's weapon. Shakes their hearts!

silver_short_sword_recipe.description: A reliable sidearm for an experienced Knight.
silver_short_sword_recipe.flavor: 'And so his blade shone under the sun for it was made not of steel but of the purest silver' - The Walks of Cid

silver_mace_recipe.description: Blunt. Strong. Unstoppable. Can break armor.

silver_mail_recipe.description: Become the real Knight in shiny armor.

legendary_buckle_recipe.description: A beautifully engraved set of buckles for the Elven King Hood.
legendary_buckle_recipe.flavor: Can also be used for an extremely expensive belt

legendary_mail_recipe.description: Chain armor akin to the ones from the Empire's royal vanguard.
legendary_mail_recipe.flavor: It is said the cape was their demise

blacksmith_workbench_recipe.description: Used by the Blacksmith to create most of their goods.

blacksmith_fuel_oven_ghost.description: Used by the Blacksmith for refining materials through controlled heating.

blacksmith_crucible_ghost.description: Used by the Blacksmith for melting and working metals or creating alloys.

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_ghost.description: Enhanced version of the anvil used by the Blacksmith for crafting.

blacksmith_forge_advanced_ghost.description: An improved and more efficient oven for smelting metals.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Blacksmith has started learning how to use a forge and heat a crucible. It will need some practice before they can work with iron and build an anvil!

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Blacksmith is now skilled enough to build an anvil and forge heavier items made of bronze and iron.
level_2_data.perk_001_description: The Blacksmith has acquired enough knowledge on forges to start producing their own fuels and facilities.

level_4_data.ornate_perk_description: Experience with smelting has gave the Blacksmith ideas on new and improved facilities that will allow them to work more efficiently and with more valuable materials.

blacksmith_description.description: The Blacksmith uses raw ores, fuels and strength to bend metals to their will, creating a wide range of goods like weapons, armor, decorations and useful tools.

mining_helmet.description: A protective iron hat that also includes a light source.

mining_helmet_iconic.description: Can be used by a Worker for additional efficiency. Also provides light.

worker_holiday_hat.description: A traditional hat for enjoying the end of the year's holidays!

winter_worker_outfit.description: A heavy wool coat, for chilly winter nights. Improves speed.

na_winter_worker_outfit.description: A heavy wool coat, for cold winter nights. Improves speed.

chilly_simple_worker_outfit.description: Wool cap and gloves. Protects from chilly weather but with no added benefits.

cold_simple_worker_outfit.description: A tepid leather outfit. Protects from cold weather but with no added benefits.

freezing_simple_worker_outfit.description: A warm, fuzzy cloak. Protects from freezing weather with no added benefits.

cold_worker_outfit.description: A high quality leather outfit. Protects from cold weather and improves speed!

na_freezing_worker_outfit.description: A masterfully made outfit. Protects from freezing weather and improves speed!

rc_winter_worker_outfit.description: A reinforced wool outfit. Protects from chilly weather and improves speed!

worker_beekeeping_hat.description: Very useful for being safe while hauling and moving around bee skeps.

cook_cheese_vat_recipe.description: The Cook or Shepherd can use this to make cheese by crafting curdling mixtures. The longer it rests the more valuable it gets.
cook_cheese_vat_recipe.flavor: You can harvest the cheese at any time during the maturation process

cook_fermenting_vat_recipe.description: The Cook or Herbalist can use this to make ale by crafting wort. Beer can be made using Gruit, crafted by the Herbalist.
cook_fermenting_vat_recipe.flavor: Ale & Beer makes hearthlings happy and only slightly tipsy

cook_brewery_recipe.description: Use to create exquisite brews and drinks.
cook_brewery_recipe.flavor: Can also be used for all sorts of mixing & preparing of beverages

curdling_mixture_recipe.description: A fermentation mixture of milk and some additives. Within a cheese vat this can be turned into cheese!
curdling_mixture_recipe.flavor: You probably don't want to know what else goes in there...

cereals_corn_recipe.description: Pour milk on top of delicious baked flakes of corn.
cereals_corn_recipe.flavor: 'Cereal first, milk afterwards. It is the natural order.' - Sir Edwin Butterfingers

butter_recipe.description: Churn a creamy and flavorful paste that is often used as a cooking ingredient.
butter_recipe.flavor: With bread it goes like bread and... Eh, nevermind

nutty_poultry_recipe.description: Stirred and fried large poultry slices with spices and nuts.
nutty_poultry_recipe.flavor: Very popular among the hearthlings from the East!

cherry_tart_recipe.description: A delicious and fresh dessert for lazy afternoons.

fruit_yogurt_recipe.description: Fermented, creamy milk sweetened with sugar and fruits.

pie_cherry_recipe.description: A tasty pie that is quite difficult to make.

nut_pralines_recipe.description: Crunchy nuts baked with a delightful caramelized sugar crust.

nuts_basket_recipe.description: An assortment of edible nuts ready to be used in cooking.

huntsman_banquet_recipe.description: An exquisite cut of venison seasoned with fruity forest flavors.

cooked_nuts_recipe.description: Shaven and tenderly cooked edible seeds like pines and acorns.

broth_recipe.description: A very nutritious and filling simmer, broth is both an ingredient or a meal on its own.

bone_marrow_recipe.description: Extremely nutritious roast made with animal bones.

boiled_shrooms_recipe.description: Boiling mushrooms will remove most of their impurities and improve their consistency.

shroom_omelette_recipe.description: A satisfying and tasty dish that is also easy to make.

roast_steak_recipe.description: The most prized and delicious cut of meat, slowly grilled on fire.

roast_fish_recipe.flavor: Straight from the sea! Or lake. Or the nearby stream...

fish_pot_pie_recipe.description: A delicious pie with a fish meat and mushroom filling.
fish_pot_pie_recipe.flavor: Better if made with all-'porpoise' flour

raw_rice_recipe.description: Delicious grains ready to be used in other recipes.
raw_rice_recipe.flavor: Who knew grass could be so tasty?

rice_flour_recipe.description: A formidable alternative for wheat flour.

nut_flour_recipe.description: Finely ground nuts. Can be used as a flour.

dough_recipe.description: Mix and knead a malleable dough to be used on baking meals like bread.

cooking_oil_recipe.description: Extract the oil from any oleaginous seeds or grains to be used as an ingredient.
cooking_oil_recipe.flavor: Pumpkin seeds, Sunflower seeds, Corn or even Paddy are examples of oil sources

dough_sweet_recipe.description: Prepare and knead an elastic and sweet dough for baking sugared goods.

batter_recipe.description: Mix a delicious, sticky and creamy paste that can be used for coating baked goods.

batter_sweet_recipe.description: Prepare a sweet and wonderful mix that can be turned into things like CAKE!
batter_sweet_recipe.flavor: The cake is not a lie!

cooked_rice_recipe.description: Boiled to perfection and sticky enough.

dumpling_salmon_recipe.description: A little bread pocket with steamed salmon stuffed inside.
dumpling_salmon_recipe.flavor: A tasty delicacy of the Northern Alliance

fisherman_soup_recipe.description: A hearty and spicy soup made with carp that is quite filling.

catfish_tagine_recipe.description: Catfish meat and vegetables simmered in a clay pot.

sushi_recipe.description: A delicious specialty from hearthlings of a very distant land.
sushi_recipe.flavor: A recipe made popular by Rayya's Children caravans that crossed the Pal'Mum

sushi_vegetarian_recipe.description: A vegetarian alternative to an exotic dish.

sugar_loaf_recipe.description: Prepare a simple yet deliciously filling sugared bread loaf.
sugar_loaf_recipe.flavor: It will sprinkle sugar all over your clothes

panettone_recipe.description: Bake a large, tasty and sweet chunk of bread filled with dried fruits.
panettone_recipe.flavor: 'A festive meal for a festive time' -Irving Balduc

pasta_recipe.description: Prepare a tasty meal with long, rolled dough noodles and a hot sauce.
pasta_recipe.flavor: There are hundreds of pasta shapes from the fair glades of Darkmoor forest all the way to the Pal'Mum desert

seared_meat_veggies_recipe.description: Prepare a pleasant platter of buttered meat slices stirred with fresh veggies.

butter_cookies_recipe.description: Bake a bunch of small and tasty buttered delicacies.
butter_cookies_recipe.flavor: Cookies can make one's life better

buttered_bulbs_recipe.description: Stir a mix of mushrooms with butter and spices.

fish_fingers_recipe.description: Prepare and fry delicious and crunchy small cuts of fish.

poyo_nuggets_recipe.description: Slice, bread and fry tasty bits of poyo meat.

cheesecake_recipe.description: Bake a very soft and flavorful cheese cream and top it with delicious fruit jelly!
cheesecake_recipe.flavor: Cheese is great, cake is great, why not get them together?

imperial_salad_recipe.description: An appetizing combination of cheese and greens.
imperial_salad_recipe.flavor: It is said that the old emperors of the Phoenix Empire loved eating veggies like this

nutty_meatballs_recipe.description: Brings forth the most exquisite flavors.

nut_cake_recipe.description: Delicious and sweet, as cake should be.
nut_cake_recipe.flavor: Better appreciated with tea, close to your hearth, while it snows outside

honeybuns_recipe.description: Sweet and fluffy little buns made with honey and butter.

glazed_pork_ribs_recipe.description: Finely cut pork ribs, honey-glazed to perfection.

glazed_veggies_recipe.description: Stirred and fried vegetables with a crusty, sugared glazing.
glazed_veggies_recipe.flavor: Sweet and salty, all at once!

melted_poyo_recipe.description: A savory roasted poyo filled with veggies and covered in melted cheese.

legendary_ink_recipe.description: Special and gilded ink for illuminated manuscripts in 'The Walk of Cid'.
legendary_ink_recipe.flavor: It is a very... complicated mixture. Don't ask

thatch_pile_recipe.description: Store a large amount of thatching for later use.

rabbit_feed_recipe.description: Selected carrots for rabbits. Improves the quality of animal produce.

poyo_feed_recipe.description: Nicely milled food for poyos. Improves the quality of animal produce.

sheep_feed_recipe.description: Tasty grasses for sheep. Improves the quality of animal produce.

fodder_recipe.description: Cheap and efficient for feeding animals, even if not exactly their favorite food...

ostrich_feed_recipe.description: A nutritious supplement for ostriches. Improves the quality of animal produce.

moomoo_feed_recipe.description: Tasty and hearty food appreciated by large ruminants. Improves the quality of animal produce.

kibble_recipe.description: Bake simple, basic rations for pets. All animals will eat this kibble.
kibble_recipe.flavor: Not their favorite but will do the trick

kibble_fish_recipe.description: Bake savory, crunchy rations for pets. Exclusively vegetarian animals will not eat this kibble.

kibble_veggie_recipe.description: Bake delicious and healthy rations for pets. Exclusively carnivore animals will not eat this kibble.

malted_grains_recipe.description: Toast some grains until they're perfectly golden. An ingredient necessary for brewing.
malted_grains_recipe.flavor: Malted Grains can also be milled for cooking oil

wort_recipe.description: An extract of mashed malted grains and herbs. Within a Fermentation Vat it can be turned into ale or beer!
wort_recipe.flavor: Wort can also be further distilled into other drinks

spirit_recipe.description: A distilled, moderately strong alcoholic beverage from grains.

spirit_fruit_recipe.description: A distilled, moderately strong alcoholic beverage from fruits.
spirit_fruit_recipe.flavor: Fruity and sweet, a festival favorite!

liquor_recipe.description: A complex, flavorful and quite strong alcoholic beverage from fermented wort.
liquor_recipe.flavor: A very fancy drink for a very fancy town

tea_recipe.description: An aromatic and warm beverage very appreciated by many! Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_desert_recipe.description: An unique recipe to the children of Rayya, a flower tea from Pal'Mum. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_desert_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_amberstone_recipe.description: A traditional recipe from the clan, delighting palates for centuries. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_amberstone_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_fancy_recipe.description: The elegant and heartwarming flavor of dried daisies and fruits. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_fancy_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

juice_berry_recipe.description: Create a fruity beverage from wild berries.

juice_cherry_recipe.description: A sour, flavorful recipe that uses wild cherries.

juice_prickly_pear_recipe.description: A peculiar beverage made with prickly pears.
juice_prickly_pear_recipe.flavor: Make sure that no spine will go with the juice...

juice_carrot_recipe.description: A nutritious and refreshing drink recipe that uses fruits and carrots.

juice_watermelon_recipe.description: Deliciously refreshing juice straight from hearty, ripe watermelons.

juice_heirbloom_recipe.description: A tasty juice with the peculiar, strong taste of heirbloom fruits.

smoothie_recipe.description: The fruity flavors go perfectly with the creamy milk in this refreshing and sweet beverage.

cook_fermenting_carboy_recipe.description: The Cook and Herbalist can use this to make mead. It requires unfermented mead, crafted by either of them.
cook_fermenting_carboy_recipe.flavor: Mead is appreciated by many but will make hearthlings tipsy

unfermented_mead_recipe.description: A mixture of water, honey and yeast. Within a Carboy it can be turned into mead!
unfermented_mead_recipe.flavor: Take rainwater kept for years, and mix a sextarius of it with a pound of honey -'On Rural Affairs', early Phoenix Empire writings

unfermented_mead_fruit_recipe.description: Like mead, but spiced up with some flavorful fruits. Within a Carboy it can be turned into fruity mead!

cook_mill_powered_ghost.description: Can be used by a Cook for milling. Requires mechanical power to work.

level_2_data.recipe_unlock_2_description: The Cook has learned to make slightly fancier recipes and can now build an oven for baked goods and a brewery for different beverages.

level_4_data.ornate_perk_description: The Cook has mastered the abilities necessary to create more diverse and specific foods, particularly specific rations for different animals.

level_6_data.mastery_description: From burning sauces to delighting crowds, a long journey has brought the Cook to the mastery of their craft. They now can try the most exotic and amazing recipes known to hearthlings.

cook_description.description: The art of cooking will provide a diverse menu of hearty meals and fortifying drinks created with resources of many origins like vegetables, meat and foraged goods.

cook_workbench_pumpkin_ghost.description: An exotic cauldron used by the Cook for delicious recipes.

cook_cheese_vat_empty.description: Used by the Cook or Shepherd to make cheese. The longer it rests, the better!

cook_cheese_vat_filled.description: The milk is curdling and shall take some time before it can be drained and formed.

cook_cheese_vat_curdled.description: Curds have formed. Drain the leftover whey or harvest for Cottage Cheese.

cook_cheese_vat_cheese_fresh.description: Fresh cheese has formed! Harvest it or let it mature some more.

cook_cheese_vat_cheese_mild.description: Mild cheese has formed! Harvest it or let it mature even more for a lot of time.

cook_cheese_vat_cheese_aged.description: This cheese is quite mature, firm and flavorful! It is time to harvest this delicacy.

cook_spoon_copper.description: Lighter and cleaner, this spoon will improve the Cook's efficiency.

cook_brewery.description: Excellent for crafting beverages and mixtures

cook_fermenting_vat_empty.description: Used by the Cook or Herbalist for fermenting beers and ales.

cook_fermenting_vat_wort.description: The wort is fermenting and will then turn into ale!

cook_fermenting_vat_beer.description: The beer is ready and can now be filtered and collected!

cook_fermenting_vat_ale.description: The ale is ready! Harvest it for the drink or add gruit to make beer.

cook_fermenting_vat_gruit.description: The mixture is bittering and getting flavorful. Soon it shall become beer!

cook_fermenting_carboy_empty.description: A ceramic vessel used by the Cook or Herbalist for fermenting brews.

cook_fermenting_carboy_mead.description: The mead is ready and can now be racked into jugs!

cook_fermenting_carboy_mead_fruit.description: The fruity mead is ready and can now be racked into jugs!

cook_fermenting_carboy_unfermented_mead.description: The mead is bubbling and warm... It is not ready yet!

cook_fermenting_carboy_unfermented_mead_.description: The fruits are fermenting and releasing all their flavors! Not yet ready...

cook_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Cook for basic provisions and delicious recipes!

wooden_animal_door_recipe.description: A large door for animal shelters, it can be closed by a shepherd. When closed, only hearthlings may go through!

wooden_animal_door_small_recipe.description: A small door for animal shelters, it can be closed by a shepherd.
wooden_animal_door_small_recipe.flavor: When placed on ground level, the two tiles of dirt underneath it must be dug out for it to work!

wooden_sign_tavern_recipe.description: A sign for a place where the night is long and merry.

long_bow_recipe.description: A longer cross-section makes it more efficient than an average bow.

crossbow_recipe.description: Not as reliable as a crossbow made with gears but still strong enough to pierce armor.

composite_bow_recipe.description: With a core made of bone and muscle fibers, the stretch allows for powerful arrows.
composite_bow_recipe.flavor: The Hunter and the Hunt as One

training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.

training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.

legendary_handle_recipe.description: The strong arm of the Ascendant Star.
legendary_handle_recipe.flavor: Long and ornate wooden handle strapped in high quality leather

ladder_recipe.description: Craft three pieces of ladder that can be placed as part of building blueprints.
ladder_recipe.flavor: Useful for reaching elevated cookie jars.

ladder_wide_recipe.description: A larger and prettier ladder for creating building blueprints.
ladder_wide_recipe.flavor: 'Chaos is not a pit. Chaos is a ladder' -Lord Petyr Belltower

bundle_of_firewood_recipe.description: Split that log into blocks for twice their efficiency! Firewood is a common, lower grade fuel
bundle_of_firewood_recipe.flavor: 'Wait, so you are NOT supposed to put an ENTIRE log in the fire?' -Dumar Quath

splitting_block_recipe.description: Create a sturdy block for splitting logs.

wood_bed_recipe.flavor: Thatch can be obtained by harvesting grass tufts, some plants like Silkweed or digging into grassy terrain

wood_bed_crude_recipe.flavor: Mean as in poor, not cruel. Though it's that too.

simple_bed_pet_recipe.description: A slightly better place for hearthlings' pets to sleep.
simple_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

comfy_bed_pet_recipe.description: Allows animals to have a more comfortable sleep.
comfy_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

ornate_bed_pet_recipe.description: Animals will have a wonderful time sleeping in this bed!
ornate_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

fuel_holder_large_wood_recipe.description: Build a reliable storage shed that will keep up to 18 Bundles O' Firewood ready to be used.

food_trough_wood_recipe.description: A trough for a Shepherd to serve food for animals in a pasture.
food_trough_wood_recipe.flavor: Shepherds will always try to keep troughs full

pet_food_bowl_wood_recipe.description: Hearthlings can put kibble in this wooden bowl for their pets to eat.
pet_food_bowl_wood_recipe.flavor: Hopefully they won't make much of a mess...

pasture_bed_small_recipe.description: Small pasture animals will go to these during the night or bad weather, place them under shelter.
pasture_bed_small_recipe.flavor: Small animals include poyos and rabbits

pasture_bed_recipe.description: Large pasture animals will go to these during the night or bad weather, place them under shelter.
pasture_bed_recipe.flavor: Large animals include sheep, ostriches and moo-moos

fish_trap_recipe.description: Used by the Trapper to safely catch and harvest fish. It can also be used to capture fish for transport.
fish_trap_recipe.flavor: Place it on water edges. It can be accessed from above and will float to the surface if placed underwater

output_cask_wood_recipe.flavor: Can only hold certain fluids and dry goods

output_cask_wood_small_recipe.flavor: Can only hold certain fluids and dry goods

input_keg_wood_recipe.description: A small serving container for 4 simple or prepared drinks.

barrel_recipe.description: Stores up to 24 items of a certain kind.
barrel_recipe.flavor: Can hold a diverse range of fluids and dry goods

barrel_small_recipe.description: Stores up to 6 items of a certain kind.
barrel_small_recipe.flavor: Can hold a diverse range of fluids and dry goods

wooden_water_well_recipe.description: Assemble the materials for upgrading a simple well into a nice, better looking wooden well.
wooden_water_well_recipe.flavor: Requires a finished simple well. One can be dug by using the command inside the 'Place' menu!

water_well_roof_wood_recipe.description: Build a good-looking roof to spruce up your water well!

wooden_stool_recipe.flavor: A higher seat for lower purposes

counter_wood_corner_inner_recipe.description: An inner corner piece for your counter.

counter_wood_corner_outer_recipe.description: A corner piece for your counter.

counter_wood_mid_recipe.description: The main part of a wooden counter.
counter_wood_mid_recipe.flavor: An appropriate surface for nightly gossip

counter_wood_mid_small_recipe.description: Half the size of a regular midsection.
counter_wood_mid_small_recipe.flavor: An appropriate surface for nightly gossip

counter_wood_end_left_recipe.description: For properly finishing your counter if not against a wall.

counter_wood_end_right_recipe.description: For properly finishing your counter if not against a wall.
counter_wood_end_right_recipe.flavor: Make sure that the right end will end it right and not wrong

counter_wood_door_recipe.description: Allows hearthlings to traverse between both sides of the counter.

level_1_data.transform_perk_description: The Carpenter is able to use their skills and their strong metal saw to carve certain wood objects like fallen tree trunks into furniture or other nice things!

level_5_data.ornate_perk_description: The Carpenter has enough skill to create valuable, intricate and extremely appealing objects by enhancing them with Gold Flakes

level_6_data.mastery_description: The Carpenter's mastery of their trade allows them to create all the possible goods and amazing ornate furniture one could imagine out of raw wood.

carpenter_description.description: The Carpenter can craft many goods like tools, construction parts, weapons and furniture from wood.

worker_holiday_hat_recipe.description: The ACE Team would like to wish you all very happy and wonderful holidays!
worker_holiday_hat_recipe.flavor: This recipe shall be removed after New Year's Eve... So craft yours while you can!

sunstroke_field_work_outfit_recipe.description: Simple and efficient. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_field_work_outfit_recipe.na_description: Simple and efficient. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.
sunstroke_field_work_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by workers and other civillians that work outside, like Shepherds, Farmers or Trappers

sunstroke_crafter_outfit_recipe.description: A finely tailored hat. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_crafter_outfit_recipe.na_description: A finely tailored hat. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.
sunstroke_crafter_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by civillian crafters, like Carpenters, Blacksmiths or Cooks

freezing_field_work_outfit_recipe.description: A warm, decorated hood. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_field_work_outfit_recipe.rc_description: A decorated hood. Protects from cold weather.
freezing_field_work_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by civillians that work outside, like Shepherds, Farmers or Trappers

freezing_crafter_outfit_recipe.description: A fuzzy and ornate wool scarf. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_crafter_outfit_recipe.rc_description: An ornate wool scarf. Protects from cold weather.
freezing_crafter_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by civillian crafters, like Carpenters, Blacksmiths or Cooks

freezing_combat_outfit_recipe.description: A thick cape made of multiple furs. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_combat_outfit_recipe.rc_description: A short cape made of fur. Protects from cold weather.
freezing_combat_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by combat units, like Footmen, Archers or Clerics

chilly_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.description: Craft a Wool cap and gloves. Protects from chilly weather but with no added benefits.
chilly_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: A family favorite for autumn days

cold_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.description: Create a tepid leather outfit. Protects from cold weather but with no added benefits.

freezing_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.description: Sew a warm and fuzzy cloak. Protects from freezing weather but with no added benefits.
freezing_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: Bears can be found in wild caves or caught by very lucky trappers

cold_worker_outfit_recipe.description: A sturdy and tepid leather outfit of good quality. Protects from cold weather and improves speed.
cold_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: When winter arrives, look the part!

rc_winter_worker_outfit_recipe.description: A nice and thick wool outfit for protecting oneself from chilly weather. Also improves speed.
rc_winter_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: It can be surprisingly cold in the desert

na_freezing_worker_outfit_recipe.description: The finest northern craftsmanship, a resistant and very warm outfit. Protects from freezing weather and improves speed.

backpack_cloth_recipe.description: Craft a very useful accessory that will allow Workers to be a bit more efficient at hauling.
backpack_cloth_recipe.flavor: Workers with backpacks won't be slowed down by carrying things and will pack/unpack faster

backpack_leather_recipe.description: Craft a very useful accessory that will allow Workers to be much more efficient at hauling.
backpack_leather_recipe.flavor: Workers with backpacks won't be slowed down by carrying things and will pack/unpack faster

sleeping_bag_recipe.description: Better than the ground but not really a homely bedding. Very portable, though!
sleeping_bag_recipe.flavor: A bed you can carry. Well, to be honest you can actually carry ANY bed...

simple_quiver_bolts_recipe.description: A quiver equippable by an archer. The bolts encased by it will slow down enemies.
simple_quiver_bolts_recipe.flavor: A bolt quiver can only be worn with crossbows

curtains_wide_recipe.description: For when the regular curtains are not enough.

curtains_tall_recipe.description: Sometimes a window needs a longer dress.

ornate_curtains_recipe.description: Craft a fancy and very elegant set of curtains.
ornate_curtains_recipe.flavor: Light has never been so beautifully blocked

ornate_curtains_wide_recipe.description: Create curtains for a very special household.

ornate_throw_rug_recipe.flavor: You will feel bad for stepping on it

ornate_banner_wall_recipe.description: Craft a beautiful ornament for a prosperous town.

legendary_hood_recipe.description: A beautiful hood worthy of the finest archer.
legendary_hood_recipe.flavor: No one can really read what is written on it. Looks cool, though.

legendary_cape_recipe.description: A majestic cape tailored for the Vanguard's Chainmail.
legendary_cape_recipe.flavor: Capes like these were proudly worn by the Vanguard

porcelain_curtains_recipe.description: A large decoration that can cover an entire wall.
porcelain_curtains_recipe.flavor: Looks good with other porcelain furniture!

chitin_helm_recipe.description: A good defense for one's head.

chitin_shield_recipe.description: A somewhat sturdy shield made of bug chitin.

level_2_data.gear_crafting_description: The Weaver has acquired enough knowledge and abilities to create a Loom and create accessories, combat equipment and outfits that provide bonuses or enhancements.

level_3_data.extended_catalog_description: The Weaver has access to many materials and can come up with several new ways to sew, stitch and stretch textiles into wonderful things.

level_5_data.ornate_perk_description: The Weaver is now able to create decorations and other goods with outstanding appeal and beauty by using exotic resources.

level_6_data.mastery_description: The Weaver's mastery of their unique craft allows them to bend the roughest wool and the smoothest silk to their will, creating anything they desire.

weaver_description.description: The Weaver can turn hides into leather and fibers into cloth, working with them to create intricate goods, clothing, armor, useful accessories and decorations.

fish_trap.description: Safely capture fish. Will float when placed in the water.
fish_trap.iconic_description: Used by the Trapper to catch fish. Can be accessed from above.
fish_trap.sprung_description: It caught something! It will soon be harvested by a Trapper...
fish_trap.empty_description: The trap was triggered but failed to get anything...

clamp_trap.description: Not so safely immobilizes its prey

level_1_data.trapper_level_1_description: Long walks have increased the trapper's foot speed. The Trapper is also able to handle up to 3 fish traps for your town.

level_3_data.trapper_level_3_description: Long practice helps the trapper salvage more from each animal. The added agility allows the Trapper to occupy themselves with 3 additional fish traps.

level_6_data.trapper_level_6_description: The trapper can now use metal clamp traps to capture big game and also has a thing or two to teach the Engineer about setting traps. Increases town trap limit and the fish trap limit by 6.

trapper_description.description: The Trapper can arm snares to capture and (ahem) "harvest" wild critters for a reliable source of food, pelts and bones.

shepherd_hood.description: A wooly hood used by the shepherd.

level_1_data.small_animals_description: The shepherd has just started mastering the techniques of animal taming and can only tame small animals.

level_3_data.big_animals_description: The shepherd is now much more experienced with animals and can tame large animals.

level_5_data.exotic_animals_description: The shepherd has mastered all there is to know about domestic animals and can even handle exotic, magical creatures.

level_6_data.level_6_description: Complete mastery of the shepherd's trade allows them to form a stronger bond with any animal. The positive effects of compassion on animals will last longer and the negative effects of slaughtering will be shorter.

shepherd_description.description: Nature-loving loners, shepherds will domesticate gentle wild animals to care for them and harvest their resources like eggs, wool and meat.

shepherd_crook_corn.description: This beautiful crook increases the Shepherd's Compassion and the happiness of the animals.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The farmer coaxes up to 25% greater yield from each plant.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The farmer can use fertilizer on crops to potentially increase their quality.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The farmer coaxes up to 50% greater yield from each plant.
level_4_data.perk_001_description: Spending too much time with crops and plants has made the farmer contemplate the possibilities of caring for more exciting and interactive beings.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The farmer coaxes 100% more yield from each plant.
level_6_data.perk_001_description: The farmer's masterful skills can now occasionally cause a crop to grow much larger and become a mega crop. These rare giant plants will provide extra resources or unique rewards.

farmer_description.description: Farmers till fields, sow seeds and harvest crops, taming the land to provide a consistent supply of food, ingredients for cooking, fibers, herbs and more.

farmer_mega_watermelon_hat.description: Can be used by Farmers for a small Speed gain and keeping their head refreshed.

freezing_crafter_outfit.description: An ornate wool scarf. Can only be worn by crafters. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_crafter_outfit.rc_description: An ornate wool scarf. Can only be worn by crafters. Protects from cold weather.

sunstroke_crafter_outfit.description: Can only be worn by crafters. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_crafter_outfit.na_description: Can only be worn by crafters. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.

freezing_combat_outfit.description: Heavy cover of pelts. Can only be worn by fighters. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_combat_outfit.rc_description: Heavy cover of pelts. Can only be worn by fighters. Protects from cold weather.

freezing_field_work_outfit.description: Warm. Can only be worn by field workers. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_field_work_outfit.rc_description: Warm. Can only be worn by field workers. Protects from cold weather.

sunstroke_field_work_outfit.description: A hat for workers and field workers. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_field_work_outfit.na_description: A hat for workers and field workers. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.

arctic_juniper_tree_seeds.description: Learn to grow arctic juniper trees.

arctic_pine_tree_seeds.description: Learn to grow arctic pine trees.

highland_pine_tree_seeds.description: Learn to grow highland pine trees.

fertilizer.description: A skilled farmer will use it to slightly improve the quality of their crops.

fertilizer_megacrop.description: A skilled farmer will use it to improve the odds of getting megacrops!

fertilizer_upgrade.description: A skilled farmer will use it to improve the quality of their crops.

fertilizer_upgrade_2.description: A skilled farmer will use it to greatly improve the quality of their crops.

captive_bees.description: Can be used to create a new bee colony. Won't last forever!

simple_hatch_wooden.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_clay.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_stone.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_iron.description: A simple, but sturdy, hatch for vertical doorways.

hidden_hatch_wooden.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

hidden_hatch_clay.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

hidden_hatch_stone.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

hidden_hatch_iron.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

diagonal_hatch_iron.description: Thick, sturdy iron hatch for your cellar. Can be locked for passage control.

water_serving_spring.description: This water is almost... magical?! Feels renewing!

mead.description: A dry beverage made from honey. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

mead_fruit.description: A sweet drink made of honey and fruits. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

thorulf.description: A former Explorer of the Library

goblin.description: A trophy from defeating goblins... Must have some value!

red_kiln.description: A trophy from defeating servants of the warchief... Must have a good value!

titan.description: A trophy from corrupted, abyssal beings... Must have an excellent value!

undead.description: A trophy from defeating the undead... Must have quite some value!

forest.description: A trophy from defeating minions of the wilds... Must have a bit of value!

unfermented_mead.description: Water, honey, yeast. The Cook or Herbalist need it to fill a fermentation carboy!

unfermented_mead_fruit.description: Smells sweet. The Cook or Herbalist need it to fill a fermentation carboy!

craftsdwarf_party.description: An industrious folk will never let go of their most prized advancements on embarkment and the Artificer is definitely the top of craftsdwarvenship.
craftsdwarf_party.tooltip: Gets you started early with the most advanced crafts.

kingdom.quote: Nature, balance and mighty shall always be the one and only struggle.
kingdom.long_description: The strong and stalwart folk of the mountains have thrived under a democratic monarchy and isolation for ages. Now they set out to face a new world of powers and technologies that might bring good or woe...
kingdom.post_selection_description: , reclusive dwarves on the brink of change.

grower_description.description: Growers will tend to plants and fungi alike, caring for underground or surface farms, crafting with herbs and looking after the wounded.

grower_trowel_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower

grower_trowel_equipped.description: Can be used by a Grower for their crafts and to tend plant and fungus alike.

grower_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Grower for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_ghost.description: Used by the Grower to create cultivars, fungal colonies and prepare plants.

grower_workbench_recipe.description: Required for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_recipe.description: Can be used to create cultivars and unlock new seeds or spores, fungal colonies and prepare plants.
grower_terrarium_recipe.flavor: Place cultivars anywhere on the world and wait for them to develop into usable forms!

gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of bitter herbs and seasonings. Birch catkins are often used in the highlands.
gruit_recipe.flavor: The Cook or Herbalist can add it to a Fermentation Vat with Ale to make beer

artificer_staff_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer

artificer_staff_equipped.description: An advanced device that can channel both the powers of the Hearth and of machines.

sweet_varanus_recipe.description: A highly traditional dwarven meal made with varanus meat and local cherries.

highland_trout_recipe.description: An exquisite meal favorite among the mountain folk.
highland_trout_recipe.flavor: Be sure to cut off the trout's head

brass_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of cheap but durable metal for furniture and construction.
brass_plate_recipe.flavor: The trick is to melt anything alongside copper

steel_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of strong and valuable metal for ornate furniture and construction.

artificer_staff_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer.
artificer_staff_recipe.flavor: 'And from twisted fires and earthly energies, Brovik whispered life into metal' Artificer Compendium I

brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.description: A brass plaque with the mark of the Blacksmith to be placed on walls.
brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.flavor: Specializing in heavy, pointy, dense things!

grower_trowel_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower.

brass_training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.

brass_training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.

mf_camp_standard_ghost.description: A sign of home for all of the mountain folk!

mf_town_banner_balance_ghost.description: For some it is between the old ways and the new that the mountain folk will find glory!

mf_town_banner_balance_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Balance, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_might_ghost.description: It is the belief of many of the mountain folk that only through fire and industry there is progress.

mf_town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Strength, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_nature_ghost.description: Many of the mountain folk will always follow the old ways.

mf_town_banner_nature_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Vitality, carrying along its blessing.

sweet_varanus.description: An exotic specialty of the dwarven cuisine.

sweet_varanus_serving.description: A delicious and traditional meat dish.

attach_to_connector.tip_title: Click on a connector to attach this item
attach_to_connector.tip_description: This item must be placed on a mechanical connector, like a gearbox, axle, or powered mill

build_well.description: Order the creation of a simple water well for hearthlings to have access to clean water
build_well.tip_title: Click to dig a well at that location
build_well.tip_description: Make sure hearthlings can access the side with the rope attached. Locations closer to water will require less digging

build_fence.tip_title: Click and drag to place the foundation for a fence

harvest_and_replant.description: Gather trees, plants, and stones from the surface of the land, replanting when possible.
harvest_and_replant.tip_title: Click and drag to harvest resources
harvest_and_replant.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_move.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to move, then click new locations for each of them as prompted.
box_move.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_undeploy.description: Undeploy these items and return them to a stockpile.
box_undeploy.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to undeploy.
box_undeploy.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_cancel_placement.description: Cancel placement or building of the ghost forms of items.
box_cancel_placement.tip_title: Click and drag to select the ghost items to cancel.
box_cancel_placement.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_enable_auto_harvest.description: Enable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own (you'll still need to instruct your hearthlings to harvest them).
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to enable auto-harvesting.
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_disable_auto_harvest.description: Disable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own.
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to disable auto-harvesting.
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_hunt.tip_title: Click and drag to mark them.
box_hunt.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

heatmap.name: heatmaps
heatmap.title: Terrain Heatmaps
heatmap.description: Useful view modes that will give you insights on different aspects of the map

ore.description: Detect ore several layers beneath the surface: areas appear brighter where ore is abundant or close to the surface.

wilderness.description: See where the world is wilder (or tamer).

craft_button.title: Craft
craft_button.description: Add this order to the end of the list. Hold [Shift] to insert at the top of the list.

quality_preference.title: Ingredient Quality Preference
quality_preference.description: Choose whether crafters should prefer high or low quality ingredients for this order. The default can be changed in Gameplay Settings.

fertilizer_settings.title: Fertilizer
fertilizer_settings.specific_description: Select a fertilizer below to only use that specific fertilizer.

season.property_description: This crop prefers the [str(i18n_data.season)] season and will grow more slowly outside of preferred seasons.
season.in_season: This crop is currently in season, so will grow at a normal rate.
season.out_of_season: This crop is currently out of season and will grow more slowly.
season.no_season_description: This crop does not have any preferred seasons and will grow normally throughout the year.

growth_time.short: This crop matures quickly ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.fair: This crop matures at a moderate rate ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.long: This crop takes a long time to mature ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.shorter: Environmental factors make this crop grow [str(i18n_data.growth_time_percent)] faster than normal!
growth_time.normal: Environmental factors make this crop grow at a normal rate.
growth_time.longer: Environmental factors make this crop grow [str(i18n_data.growth_time_percent)] slower than normal!
growth_time.too_long: This crop is growing immeasurably slowly due to environmental factors!
growth_time.stopped: This crop's growth is currently stopped.

water_affinity.range: This crop will grow a little faster than normal with [str(i18n_data.min_water_level)] - [str(i18n_data.max_water_level)] water, through its general environment or irrigation within its blue outlined region.
water_affinity.min_only: This crop will grow a little faster with at least [str(i18n_data.min_water_level)] water, through its general environment or irrigation within its blue outlined region.
water_affinity.current_level: This crop currently has [str(i18n_data.current_water_level)] water through its general environment and irrigation within its blue outlined region.

light_affinity.range: This crop will grow a little faster than normal with [str(i18n_data.min_light_level)] - [str(i18n_data.max_light_level)] daytime sunlight.
light_affinity.min_only: This crop will grow a little faster with at least [str(i18n_data.min_light_level)] daytime sunlight.
light_affinity.current_level: This crop currently experiences [str(i18n_data.current_light_level)] daytime sunlight. This considers both shade and current weather state.

flooded.requires: This crop must have water covering it to grow.
flooded.prefers: This crop grows more quickly when water is covering it and slower when it isn't.
flooded.prefers_not: This crop grows more slowly when water or snow is covering it.

fertilized.current_amount: [str(i18n_data.num_fertilized)] / [str(i18n_data.num_crops)] crops in this field are currently fertilized.

underfarm.substrate_description: You need a layer of organic material to plant undercrops.

pasture.maintain_animals_description: Automatically slaughter any animals beyond this number.
pasture.harvest_animals_renewable_description: Harvest renewable resources from these animals, like wool or eggs.
pasture.harvest_grass_description: Automatically harvest any grass that grows in the pasture.
pasture.ostrich_pasture_description: These exotic birds produce delicious large eggs and can be slaughtered for large poultry, jerky, feathers and bone
pasture.sheep_pasture_description: Sheep produce wool and, seldom, some milk. Slaughtering sheep will produce raw mutton, jerky, and bone
pasture.moomoo_pasture_description: Moo-moos eat a lot but will produce nice amounts of milk. Slaughtering them yields pelts, steak, jerky and bone
pasture.rabbit_pasture_description: Rabbits reproduce quickly and can be slaughtered for jerky, pelts and sometimes bone
pasture.poyo_pasture_description: Poyos lay eggs, a fine cooking ingredient. Slaughtering poyo will yield meat and, often, feathers and bone

patrol_banners.move_banner_up_description: Move the selected banner up in the patrol order.
patrol_banners.move_banner_down_description: Move the selected banner down in the patrol order.
patrol_banners.create_banner_description: Create a new banner for this party, at the end of the order or immediately after the currently selected banner.
patrol_banners.clear_banners_description: Remove all banners for this party. To remove the selected banner, use the command on the selected entity window.

show_promotion_tree.tooltip_description: Click to promote this hearthling to a different job.

toggle_component_info.tooltip_description: Click to show or hide extra information about this entity.

crafter.description: Civillian jobs that are able to create items out of raw materials and resources. Carpenter or Blacksmith, for example.

combat.description: Military jobs that are able to follow orders and engage in combat to defend the town! Footmen or Archers, for example.

field_work.description: Civillian jobs that will specialize in specifc, diverse activities outside of the main crafting chains. Farmers or Shepherds, for example.

drink.high: This drink provides [str(servings)] highly satisfying servings
drink.average: This drink provides [str(servings)] somewhat satisfying servings
drink.low: This drink provides [str(servings)] mildly satiating servings

food.high: This food provides [str(servings)] very filling meals
food.average: This food provides [str(servings)] quite filling meals

new_title.title: [str(i18n_data.entity.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)] has achieved a new Title!
new_title.message:
[str(i18n_data.new_title.description)]

Doesn't that title have a nice ring to it? You can select which title one of your citizens is using by right-clicking their name in their character sheet or the selected unit window.
new_title.item_message:
[str(i18n_data.new_title.description)]

Doesn't that title have a nice ring to it? You can select which title this item is using by right-clicking its name in the selected unit window.

You might also consider giving [str(i18n_data.entity.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)] a fancier name to go along with their new title by left-clicking its name in the selected unit window.

gameplayTab.auto_craft_recipe_dependencies_descripti: When crafting an item, crafters will check the inventory to see if there are sufficient ingredients to use. If not, they will queue up orders for enough ingredients to fulfill the original order.
gameplayTab.auto_craft_killed_items_description: When an item you own is killedâlike a door, a training dummy, or a siege weaponâqueue a craft order for a new one.
gameplayTab.default_craft_order_prefer_high_quality_: When crafting an item, crafters who have achieved the Journeyman's Knowledge perk will prefer crafting with high-quality ingredients. Uncheck to always prefer low-quality ingredients.
gameplayTab.show_unreachable_ingredients_notificatio: Show an alert when a crafter cannot reach ingredients for their recipe.WARNING:This may cause a lot of alerts!
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_enabled_description: When a renewable resource you own becomes harvestable, automatically issue a harvest command on that resource.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_tree_stumps_description: When trees are cut down, harvestable stumps remain. Enabling this option will automatically queue stumps to be harvested.
gameplayTab.default_to_worst_fertilizer_description: When farmers fertilize crops, they use the best fertilizer available unless directed to use a specific type. Select this to have them use the worst available instead.
gameplayTab.default_fertilizer_description: When creating a new farm, set its fertilizer preference to this.
gameplayTab.show_new_title_notification_description: When one of your citizens (or other items) achieves a title, display an in-game notification about it.
gameplayTab.auto_select_new_titles_description: When one of your citizens (or other items) achieves a title, automatically select it as their active title.
gameplayTab.terrain_slice_buildings_description: In Terrain Slice mode, don't render entities supported by visible, non-terrain entities.
gameplayTab.water_signal_update_frequency_descriptio: Only update water signals this many ticks of the water system. Increase this value to improve performance with lots of flowing water.
gameplayTab.show_processing_meter_description: Show the processing meter, useful for understanding performance issues, in the lower right of the screen, to the left of the game speed buttons.
gameplayTab.show_component_info_description: Show a clickable info button on the selected unit window when the selected entity has additional detailed info.
gameplayTab.auto_save_max_files_description: When Auto Save and Auto Save Unique Files are enabled, start overwriting older auto-saves after this limit is reached.WARNING:The next time you save after setting this to a lower number, many older auto-saves may be deleted.
gameplayTab.auto_save_interval_description: When Auto Save is enabled in the Save dialog, automatically save at this frequency.
gameplayTab.auto_save_unique_files_description: When auto-saving, create a separate save with the date and time.WARNING:Frequent auto-saving requires a lot of storage space!

bullet_points.000: The value itself represents a bonus percentage added over every experience gain.

equipment_piece.description: Can be equipped by certain hearthlings.

evolve.description: Will transform into something else over time.

growing.description: Has multiple growth stages, with a growth rate affected by nearby water (or lack thereof) and rainy weather.

renewable_resource_node.description: Can be harvested repeatedly, requiring some time between each harvest in order to renew.

resource_node.description: Can only be harvested once and is then destroyed.

stacks.description: When used in crafting or trading, the entire item will be consumed. Otherwise, only a single stack is consumed at a time, until the last stack is consumed and the item is destroyed.

aquatic_object.description: Responds to the presence of water (or lack thereof).

fence.description: Limited tile-able item that will automatically connect to others within two units.

mechanical.description: Can be used in building connected systems to transfer mechanical power.
mechanical.produces: This mechanical device is currently producing [str(produces)] / [str(def_produces)] power.
mechanical.consumes: This mechanical device is currently consuming [str(consumes)] / [str(def_consumes)] power.
mechanical.resistance: This mechanical device is causing [str(resistance)] / [str(def_resistance)] resistance.
mechanical.power_percentage: This mechanical device's network is currently operating at [str(power_percentage)] % efficiency.

pile.description: Contains resources that can be harvested after placing it on the ground.
pile.item_list_header: This pile currently contains the following [str(item_count)] items:

tile.description: Tile-able item that will automatically connect adjacently and update its model.

titles.description: This entity can be given a title that will show up after their name. Right-click their name in the selected unit window or their character sheet (if they have one) to select a different title.
titles.all_earned_titles: The following titles have been earned:
titles.unattained: This is the next rank that hasn't yet been attained.

transform.description: Will transform into something else when a specific command or action is performed on it.

vine.description: Grows by spreading, but each one will only grow a few times. May be climbable.

water_pump.description: When enabled, pumps water from its bottom and out its top.

cheese.description: This cheese is starting to... Smell cheesy. Better eat it soon.

curdling.description: It's getting bad, better pour it in a cheese vat soon!

shipwreck_crate.description: Harvest it for loot; it contains treasure! Or does it?

shipwreck_chest.description: Harvest it for loot, whoever lost it won't mind... Right?

decay_1.description: It's starting to go bad, should probably drink it soon.

keg.description: Has been around for a long while and is a bit stale already.
